profile.profileDescription: Use this profile if you want a system that is compliant with basic EBU Core.

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Type
label.description: The nature or genre of the resource.

label.name: Format
label.description: The file format or physical medium or dimensions of the resource.

label.name: Source
label.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

label.name: Relation
label.description: A related resource. (This is only text field - use Related Objects or the Hierarchy Location editor to create relationships in CA).

label.name: Coverage
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Version
label.description: Expresses the version type of the resource.

label.name: Publication History
label.description: To provide information about the publication history.

label.name: Metadata Provider
label.description: Identifies the Metadata provider,i.e. a person or organisation. The organisation Id or name would provide the archive ID or name required for OAI Metadata harvesting operation.

label.name: Entity Note
label.description: Provides details information about a person, a group of persons, or organisation

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.
